tha-ap503:11.4: yenicchakā yadicchakā → yenicchakā yathicchakaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); yadicchakāyadicchakā (mr)
tha-ap503:12.4: bibbohanasamāyutaṁ → bimbohanasamāyutaṁ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, csp1ed)
tha-ap503:15.2: sāyaṁ pātamupaṭṭhahuṁ → sāyaṁ pātaṁ upaṭṭhahuṁ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); sāyapātamupaṭṭhahuṁ (csp1ed)
